data.text: Isirayila luxi nɛ alɔ sansi bili fanyi naxan bogima a fanyi ra.
E bɔɲɛ mu na Alatala gbansan xa ra,
E wɔyɛnma, e e kalima, e saatɛ tongoma,
Samarikae fama nɛ kɔntɔfilide e xa ninge kuyee xa fe ra
Na kuyee xaninma nɛ Asiriya bɔxi ma,
Samari nun a mangɛ xaninma nɛ,
Kuye batudee naxee na Beti Aweni, e kanama nɛ.
«Isirayila, kabi wo naxa na yunubi ɲaaxi raba Gibiya,
A bara n kɛnɛn n xa e halaki.
Efirami luxi nɛ alɔ ninge xuruxi, wali rafan naxan ma.
Kɔnɔ wo tan mu tin na wali tinxinxi ra.
Na mɔɔli fama nɛ Beteli lide
